about_the_game:
Get Bento! is a bento box-building puzzle game.

Design sushi and add them to your bento box for today's lunch. Sort and arrange your tasty treats neatly, ensuring they all fit into your lunch box.

Get Bento! follows a young girl during her holiday break as she packs delicious snacks into her bento box to take to her summer job.

FEATURES


  • Lunch Box
    80 cutesy hand drawn sushi and other bento box tasties for you to collect and arrange in your lunch box.
  • Levels
    The games has 100 levels designd to stimulate your puzzling needs.
  • Arcade Modes
    If you can't get enough of organising sushi into your bento box you'll love the extra modes crafted to keep the fun going indefinitely.
  • Steam Deck
    The game is the perfect relaxation game built for the steam deck and controller but works beautifully with a mouse too.

Get Bento! is a bento box-building puzzle game.

Design sushi and add them to your bento box for today's lunch. Sort and arrange your tasty treats neatly, ensuring they all fit into your lunch box.

Get Bento! follows a young girl during her holiday break as she packs delicious snacks into her bento box to take to her summer job.

name: Get Bento!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 11, 10, 8.1, 8, 7, Vista, XP
  • Processor: Intel® Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct x
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Generic Sound Device

supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Czech*, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian*, Indonesian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*
*languages with full audio support
